articles.title: "Even I Am Not...": Rohit Sharma's Big Revelation On India's Asia Cup Squad - NDTV Sports
articles.description: The BCCI is yet to announce India's squad for the Asia Cup and skipper Rohit Sharma stressed that even he isn't an automatic choice.
articles.content: Several new players have made their senior international debut in the Indian team since the conclusion of the 2022 T20 World Cup. While the likes of Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma have been away from t… [+2337 chars]
